title: Dow Movers: BA, PFE - Nasdaq.com
text: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Pfizer topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.1%. Year to date, Pfizer has lost about 17.7% of its value.    makeArticleAd();  And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Boeing, trading down 3.1%. Boeing is showing a gain of 9.4% looking at the year to date performance.      Two other components making moves today are Goldman Sachs Group, trading down 2.1%, and Merck, trading up 0.5% on the day.        VIDEO: Dow Movers: BA, PFE
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
